items.title: Man accused of beheading father and posting video of his severed head to stand trial
items.description: A Pennsylvania man accused of killing his father and posting a video of his severed head online faces trial Monday in the Philadelphia suburbs

items.title: Flooding from Chantal's remnants forces dozens to flee homes in North Carolina
items.description: Officials in North Carolina say heavy rain and flooding from the remnants of Tropical Storm Chantal forced dozens of people to flee their homes

items.title: What to know about the flash floods in Texas that killed more than 80 people
items.description: Flash floods in Texas have killed at more than 80 people, many of them children

items.title: Risk of further floods in Texas during desperate search for missing as death toll tops 80
items.description: The risk of life-threatening flooding is still high in central Texas with more rain on the way

items.title: 3 dead, 10 injured in South Philadelphia shooting; person is in custody, police say
items.description: Authorities say three people were killed and 10 others injured in a shooting
